column3: There is a half eaten slice of pizza on the table

THE SIGN READS:
STUDENT ALLERGIES:
Bryce Balin - Peanuts
Judy Wrench - Olives
Becky Barnett - Gerbils
column6: Beck Barnett is allergic to Gerbils

column3: You see a small handwritten sign

The smell of today’s lunch greets your nostrils: pizza. Your mouth waters but your time is limited.\nYou look around and see that the cafeteria is empty save for a few cooks working tirelessly\nin the background preparing the day’s meal. You look for things relevant to your case but don’t see much worth mentioning.
The beaker appears to have been knocked of the table
beep beep
Everything is blue

You try to quietly open the door to the Science Lab but it creaks open with a groan. You cringe hoping that no one heard, but unfortunately Ms. Frizzle heard your noisy entrance. She welcomes you into the room where you step past rows of blacktop desks, Erlenmeyer flasks, vials, and an assortment of other alarming things.

LETTER READS, Mrs. Crabtree, I must profess my utmost fear for our dear gerbil’s life. Red McGuffin is a boy of questionable character and I have seen him antagonize dear Lemiwinks on multiple occasions. If you let him take him home for the weekend, I fear that he may not make it back to school on Monday alive.
column6: LETTER READS, Mrs. Crabtree, I must profess my utmost fear for our dear gerbil’s life. Red McGuffin is a boy of questionable character and I have seen him antagonize dear Lemiwinks on multiple occasions. If you let him take him home for the weekend, I fear that he may not make it back to school on Monday alive.

column3: On the table in front of you is an opened letter.
disgusting cake
A half-eaten birthday cake rests on the counter in the back and you feel like you spied a mouse nibbling on it before scurrying off.
covfefe lots of covfefe

You enter the teacher’s lounge with full confidence in your abilities. With your hall pass,
you are invincible. You are slightly disappointed that there are no teachers present so
that you can prove your abilities. Alas, you get past this and continue on. You look
around to see run down furniture covered in coffee stains.
On the jungle gym, you see Red McGuffin, the class bully swindling other students out of their lunch money playing blackjack.

The door’s to the outside world gust open to the warmth of daylight… and freedom.
You want to relish in the glory of the sun but you remember your task at hand and look around. You see your
classmates enjoying themselves in blissful ignorance (or perhaps knowing guilt) that one of their
classmates is guilty of a crime most heinous.
NOTE READS\n10:00 AM - Please excuse Tanner Laramie’s tardiness today. He was at the dentist’s office.
A sick note rests unattended on her desk
You enter the Nurse’s office to find it vacant. Surrounding you is a sterile environment of gauze,\ndisinfectant, and charts. A lone plastic skeleton stands resolute in the corner.
You discover amongst the rubbage a disgusting jock strap
A set of flithy bleachers from last night's game

As you walk into the gym you are immediately hit by the smell of sweat and bleach.\nYou hold back your breath and examine the room. You don’t see much of consequence aside\nfrom the wooden floor & bleachers & basketball hoops.

column3: You walk over to the empty cage and see that the cage door has indeed be left open.
There is a teacher's desk by the chalkboard
There is an empty classroom with a chalkboard and desks.
You discover some gerbil food inside
column6: Found some gerbil food in the PETA decorated locker

column3: You find only one locker left unlocked. Inside are posters of PETA

The hallway has access to every room but some are locked. The doors you can see lead to:\nThe Classroom, The Gym, The Nurses’ Office, The Playground, The Science Lab, The Teachers’ Lounge, & The Cafeteria.
